name: pdf-wasm
description: Complete PDF manipulation module written in Go and compiled to WebAssembly. Provides comprehensive PDF operations with GoWM integration.
author: Ben

functions.name: createPDF
functions.description: Generate PDF from scratch with custom pages and metadata

parameters.name: pages
parameters.description: JSON string of page configurations with content, dimensions, and margins

parameters.name: metadata
parameters.description: Optional JSON string of PDF metadata (title, author, subject)

functions.errorPattern: Returns object with 'error' field on failure

functions.name: addPage
functions.description: Add a new page to existing PDF document
functions.errorPattern: Returns object with 'error' field on failure
functions.example:
const pageContent = JSON.stringify({content: 'New page content', width: 210, height: 297});
const result = pdf.call('addPage', existingPdfData, pageContent);

functions.name: extractText
functions.description: Extract text content from PDF document
functions.errorPattern: Returns object with 'error' field on failure

functions.name: extractImages
functions.errorPattern: Returns object with 'error' field on failure

functions.name: mergePDFs
functions.description: Merge multiple PDF documents into one

parameters.name: pdfArray
parameters.description: JSON string array of base64-encoded PDF data

functions.errorPattern: Returns object with 'error' field on failure

functions.name: splitPDF
functions.description: Split PDF document into separate parts

parameters.name: ranges
parameters.description: JSON string array of page ranges (e.g., ['1-3', '4-6', '7'])

functions.errorPattern: Returns object with 'error' field on failure

functions.name: addWatermark
functions.description: Add watermark text to PDF document

parameters.name: watermarkData
parameters.description: JSON string of watermark configuration (text, opacity, rotation, etc.)

functions.errorPattern: Returns object with 'error' field on failure

functions.name: generateReport
functions.description: Generate PDF report from data and template
functions.errorPattern: Returns object with 'error' field on failure

functions.name: getPDFInfo
functions.description: Get PDF metadata and document information
functions.errorPattern: Returns object with 'error' field on failure

functions.name: compressPDF
functions.description: Compress PDF file with configurable compression level
functions.errorPattern: Returns object with 'error' field on failure

functions.name: setSilentMode
functions.description: Enable or disable console logging for operations

parameters.name: silent
parameters.description: True to enable silent mode, false to show logs

functions.example:
pdf.call('setSilentMode', true); // Disable logging
pdf.call('setSilentMode', false); // Enable logging

functions.name: getAvailableFunctions
functions.description: Get list of all available PDF functions
functions.example:
const functions = pdf.call('getAvailableFunctions');
console.log('Available functions:', functions);

errorHandling.description: PDF module returns objects with 'error' field when operations fail

examples.error: Invalid PDF data: illegal base64 data at input byte 15
examples.cause: Called extractText() with malformed base64 PDF data

examples.error: Failed to generate PDF: insufficient page content
examples.cause: Called createPDF() with empty or invalid page configurations

examples.error: Watermark addition failed: invalid opacity value
examples.cause: Called addWatermark() with opacity outside 0-1 range

examples.error: PDF merge failed: at least 2 PDFs required
examples.cause: Called mergePDFs() with less than 2 PDF documents

errorHandling.detection: if (result.error) { /* handle error */ } else { /* use result data */ }

types.name: PDFResult
types.description: Standard result type for PDF operations
types.details: Returns object with PDF data on success, or object with 'error' field on failure

features: Efficient memory usage for large documents

examples.title: GoWM Integration - Basic PDF Creation
Advanced PDF Manipulation
React Hook Integration

changes: PDF creation from scratch with custom pages
Page manipulation (add pages to existing PDFs)
